 Object

Optional manager with a default value

(default: John Wayne)

The name of the employee.

The employee's department.

The employees who are responsible for the project.

The name of an employee.
employees[].department string

The employee's department.

Events

  • $routeChangeSuccess

    Broadcasted after a route dependencies are resolved. ngView listens for the directive to instantiate the controller and render the view.

    Type:
    broadcast
    Target:
    root scope
    Parameters
    Param Type Details
    angularEvent Object

    Synthetic event object.
    current Route

    Current route information.
    previous Route,Undefined

    Previous route information, or undefined if current is first route entered.
